subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams defeated unseeded Virginie Razzano, 6-4, 6-2, to win the Dubai Tennis Championships. The victory gave Williams her 40th career singles title and was her seventh win in her last eight finals. Her previous title came in November, at the WTA Championships in Doha, Qatar.
